languages.text: {n}Во взгляде арбитра возникает теплый огонек.{/n} "Что будет, если я отвечу "Да"?"
{n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "And what happens if I say yes?"
languages.original_text: {n}Во взгляде арбитра возникает теплый огонек.{/n} "Что будет, если я отвечу "Да"?"

languages.text: {n}彼のまなざしに、あたたかな光が宿った。{/n}「もしイエスと言ったら？」
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "And what happens if I say yes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼のまなざしに、あたたかな光が宿った。{/n}「もしイエスと言ったら？」

languages.text: {n}Ein warmes Licht erhellt seinen Blick.{/n} "Und was passiert, wenn ich Ja sage?"
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "And what happens if I say yes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein warmes Licht erhellt seinen Blick.{/n} "Und was passiert, wenn ich Ja sage?"

languages.text: {n}Son visage s'éclaire.{/n} « Que se passera-t-il si je vous réponds "oui" ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "And what happens if I say yes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Son visage s'éclaire.{/n} « Que se passera-t-il si je vous réponds "oui" ? »

languages.text: {n}Su rostro se ilumina afectuosamente.{/n} «¿Y qué pasa si digo que sí?».
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "And what happens if I say yes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Su rostro se ilumina afectuosamente.{/n} «¿Y qué pasa si digo que sí?».

languages.text: {n}他的目光中浮现出一丝温暖的光芒。{/n}“如果我想，又会怎么样呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "And what happens if I say yes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他的目光中浮现出一丝温暖的光芒。{/n}“如果我想，又会怎么样呢？”

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarında sıcak bir ışık beliriyor.{/n} "Peki ya evet dersem?"
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "And what happens if I say yes?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışlarında sıcak bir ışık beliriyor.{/n} "Peki ya evet dersem?"
